task.command_line: --fixed-weave-cache --segment-end-pad 16 --cluster-method window --low-frequency-cutoff 30 --pad-data 8 --cluster-window 1 --sample-rate 4096 --injection-window 4.5 --segment-start-pad 112 --psd-segment-stride 8 --approximant SPAtmplt --psd-inverse-length 16 --filter-inj-only --autogating-width 0.25 --psd-segment-length 16 --snr-threshold 5.5 --segment-length 256 --autogating-threshold 100 --autogating-cluster 0.5 --newsnr-threshold 5 --psd-estimation median --autogating-taper 0.25 --strain-high-pass 20 --order -1 --chisq-bins "1.75*(get_freq('fSEOBNRv2Peak',params.mass1,params.mass2,params.spin1z,params.spin2z)-60.)**0.5" --channel-name H1:DCS-CALIB_STRAIN_C01 --gps-start-time 1128824812 --gps-end-time 1128826860 --trig-start-time 1128824973 --trig-end-time 1128826801 --output H1-INSPIRAL_FULL_DATA_JOB13-1128824973-1828.hdf --frame-files H-H1_HOFT_C01-1128820736-4096.gwf H-H1_HOFT_C01-1128824832-4096.gwf --bank-file H1L1-PREGEN_TMPLTBANK_SPLITBANK_BANK8-1126051217-3331800.xml.gz --verbose
